serviceDescription:
Somers, Connecticut homeowners seeking the ultimate in roofing technology are turning to integrated solar roof installations. Our premium solar roofing systems completely replace your existing roof with stunning, energy-generating shingles that combine superior weather protection with substantial electricity production. Unlike traditional solar panels that mount on top of your roof, solar shingles create a seamless, elegant appearance that enhances your home's curb appeal while delivering decades of clean, renewable energy and significant utility savings.

Serving Somers and Tolland County for over 12 years, we bring unmatched expertise to every solar roof installation. From historic homes near Soapstone Mountain to modern properties throughout Somers, our systems are engineered to exceed Connecticut building codes and withstand the region's demanding weather conditions. Each solar shingle features Class A fire rating, impact resistance that surpasses traditional roofing materials, and structural strength three times that of standard tiles. We've helped hundreds of Somers families achieve dramatic energy cost reductions while increasing their property values by an average of $20,000-$40,000.

Our comprehensive approach to solar roof installation in Somers begins with an in-depth assessment of your home's structural integrity, roof orientation, shading, and energy consumption patterns. Our NABCEP-certified solar professionals design custom systems optimized for maximum energy production and aesthetic harmony with your home's architecture. We manage every aspect of your project - from careful removal of your old roof to installation of premium underlayment, advanced flashing systems, and precision-placed solar shingles. All necessary permits through Somers building department and utility interconnection with Eversource are handled by our experienced team, ensuring a smooth, hassle-free process.

With the federal solar financing and Connecticut's robust solar benefits, solar roof installation is more affordable than ever for Somers homeowners. Our systems typically generate $2,500-4,500 in annual electricity savings, with many customers achieving 90-100% energy independence. We offer flexible financing options including $0 down solar loans that make premium solar roofing accessible to every family. Combined with industry-leading 25-year warranties on both power production and roof weatherproofing, investing in a solar roof for your Somers home delivers value for decades. Contact us today for your free consultation and discover how beautiful and rewarding solar roofing can be.

faq.question: How does a solar roof perform in Connecticut winters?
faq.answer: Solar roofs excel in Somers winters! The dark solar shingles absorb heat, helping snow melt faster than traditional roofing. While production is lower during short winter days, our systems are optimized for year-round Connecticut weather. Solar shingles are engineered to handle heavy snow loads, extreme temperatures, and ice common in Tolland County.

faq.question: What's the difference between solar roof and traditional solar panels?
faq.answer: Solar roofs integrate directly into your roof structure, replacing traditional shingles with energy-generating ones. This creates seamless aesthetics versus bulky panels mounted on top. Solar roofs provide complete roof replacement, often come with better warranties, and add more home value. They're ideal if your Somers home needs a new roof anyway.
